show.name: Ortigia Sound System Festival 2021
show.description:
Lido OSS is a paradise corner in the heart of Ortigia island. A multidisciplinary area where you can enjoy music from our local hosts, chat and chill, interacting with our cultural space - always kissed by the sun.



A 12h-no-stop live broadcasted on our website and Mixcloud channel.



From the 28th of July 2021 till the 2nd of August 2021 we lived the wave of the Island with Ortigia Sound System Festival ðŸŒŠ
